backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing core land-minting logic, data types, access control, and registries for land, profiles, loot, and modifiers.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Instructions for performing a forced reinstall of Land and Asset canisters on mainnet, including prerequisites and required canister IDs.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: High‑level deployment checklist outlining environment setup steps before launching CyberGenesis.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Step‑by‑step guide for deploying the full CyberGenesis Land Mint DApp to IC mainnet, including prerequisites and asset requirements.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Brief deployment instructions emphasizing correct order of deploying all five canisters.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer documentation describing CyberGenesis architecture, canister roles, and system overview.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Guide listing required frontend environment variables and network configuration details.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide for configuring environment variables and deploying backend canisters to resolve configuration errors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing diagnostic 3D scene updates applied to CubeVisualization.tsx with associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing the purpose and behavior of all key frontend components and pages.
frontend/.env: Mainnet environment configuration defining canister IDs, network settings, stability parameters, and admin principal.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment template showing required variables for local and mainnet setups.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the Vite-built React app with caching disabled.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling identity initialization, actor setup, user profile detection, and conditional rendering of loading, reinitialization, profile setup, landing, or dashboard views.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the asset backend canister including asset types, user roles, profiles, and all available backend methods.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the asset backend service interface for asset management, admin functions, access control, and user profiles.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory for the main backend canister including land data, rewards, loot, modifiers, upgrades, user profiles, and system queries.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin-only GLB model upload UI that validates authorization, checks canister health, and manages drag-and-drop upload flow with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for uploading GLB files with health checks, file validation, and simulated upload progress.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostic tool running multiple tests on asset and land canisters, logging results, checking permissions, connectivity, and cycle balance.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: Admin-only tool that runs pre-checks and post-checks and executes a multi‑step asset canister reinitialization workflow. Manages authorization state, step tracking, and health validation of asset and land canisters.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Performs periodic health checks of land and asset canisters across multiple IC gateways. Measures response times, determines overall status, and generates recommendations based on gateway test results.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Displays whether environment variable canister IDs match known correct IDs. Shows per‑canister status and highlights mismatches for configuration debugging.
Validates critical environment variables at runtime and displays an error banner if required config values are missing. Lists errors, warnings, and suggested fixes for incorrect setup.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders an animated 2D canvas starfield and nebula background with twinkling and pulsing effects. Handles window resizing and manages animation via requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: Renders a Three.js scene with biome-based models, diagnostic lighting, background sphere, fog, and bloom effects.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing; all logic moved elsewhere.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Checks canister health for Land and Asset canisters, showing status, errors, and refresh controls.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Handles loot cache discovery and processing, checking balances, calling actor methods, and updating cached data.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React error boundary that captures component errors and shows a styled fallback alert.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Provides UI for staking tokens, creating proposals, and voting on active proposals with backend interactions.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Displays land stats, cooldown timers, rewards, upgrades, and modifier application with admin debug options.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads a GLTF land model with KTX2 textures, applies biome-based PBR tweaks, and auto-fits the camera to the model.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: Displays land info with biome labels and navigation buttons to switch between available lands.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Fetches and shows a top‑10 land leaderboard with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Renders a pannable and zoomable world map with gesture controls and positioning based on user land coordinates.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Implements a marketplace UI for viewing, filtering, buying, and listing land and modifier items.
Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Performs periodic health checks to an asset canister and displays connection status, latency, and uptime.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Canvas-based particle animation with interactive movement, connections, and resize handling.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: UI for editing a land plot's name and decoration URL using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Connect/disconnect button for Plug Wallet with dropdown for copy and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form allowing the user to submit and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Fullscreen overlay showing connection retry progress, gateway info, and attempt counter.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with reset option.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Mainnet configuration for canister IDs, asset URLs, feature flags, wallet settings, and helpers.
Provides React context for Plug Wallet handling connection, principal state, and actor creation.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Contains a static list of placeholder modifier items grouped by rarity tiers for UI use.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and result types for the governance backend service.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Provides Candid IDL definitions for proposals, voting, staking, and governance service methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Implements automatic actor reinitialization with retry logic and gateway rotation on connection failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Wraps useActor with additional initialization, polling, and connectivity validation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Handles environment validation, gateway health checks, and creation of an asset canister actor with retries and failover.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Provides a hook that performs a delayed health check on the asset canister and returns its health status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: Implements GLB file upload to the asset canister using Plug wallet authentication and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Initializes the governance canister actor with identity, retries, and gateway selection for failover.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Initializes the marketplace canister actor with identity, retries, and gateway failover logic.
Defines reusable Plug Wallet transaction hook and marketplace/governance-specific mutation hooks with query invalidation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for land data, user profiles, token balances, and placeholder types for marketplace/governance operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Initializes the token canister actor with retry logic, gateway selection, and identity integration for Internet Identity sessions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global styles, Tailwind layers, fonts, and neon-themed UI effects for the application.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exposes build timestamp/version info and utilities for cache busting and build logging.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Implements 3D scene debugging utilities, including logs, GPU diagnostics, renderer detection, and performance helpers.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty placeholder file for model loading functionality.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Provides utilities to format and parse ICRC‑1 token amounts, including decimal handling and formatted output with separators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the marketplace canister, including item types, listing structures, and buy results.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory describing the marketplace canister’s service, records, and variants.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Renders the modifier collection page with rarity tiers, counts, and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main user dashboard managing tabs, land data fetching, and rendering different feature views.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with Internet Identity login flow, animated visuals, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Shows land‑minting initialization status and transitions toward the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Displays a canister ID verification tool with themed background and return link.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the token canister, including accounts, transfers, metadata, and admin functions.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Defines Candid IDL types and service interface for token operations including balance, transfer, metadata, supply, and mint.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: TypeScript declarations enabling WebGPU API usage and feature detection without compiler errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and persisting or clearing them across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, containers, and plugins for the frontend.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variables, asset handling (including WASM), custom build filenames, and dev server setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, diagnostic rendering tasks, feature requests, and known issues for the 3D background debug work.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian-language deployment overview and quick‑start instructions for CyberGenesis.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Mainnet batch uploader for .glb assets that handles canister lookup, rate limiting, upload verification, and summary output.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Local script that batch‑uploads tiered .glb models to an AssetCanister using dfx and verifies uploaded assets.
unknown.txt: Contains a brief note referencing a health‑endpoint test.
